*KDD Cup 2014 - Predicting Excitement at DonorsChoose.org
How Many Exciting Projects are there?
========================================================
How many projects are exciting are there? 
How many projects are exciting?
What is the likelihood of an exiting project to appear?
Is the data seasonal? Is there a trend?

There are some of the questions posted by the KDD Cup challenge of this year. I tried to answer them with the help of some visualizations. I hope they help you better understand the problem at hand as they have helped me. Enjoy!
